channel.title: Tentacles are insane
channel.description: I know you wanted to emphasize distracting them with grenades, but currently there is no way to sneak by them by moving silently because they bang all the time like crazy. I remember in 2012 release, one of the tentacles (the only furthest from me) DID enter an idle stance and it didn't bang the floors, but a slight itch of movement provoked it into banging again. So it seems that idle behavior is actually coded and intended, but somehow not working correctly.

item.title: Tentacles are insane
item.dc:creator: saivert
item.description:
Yes. It doesn’t work as it did in original Half-Life. You can’t sneak past them now. I finally figured out to just throw a grenade to slightly distract them while running like hell to the nearest ladder. Throw another grenade and repeat until you get out.
If this is the intended way to defeat get past them I’m dissapointed.
